1370: Nellen moved to Potstraet.B.3 after marriage.
Got married to Lieuin at age 23 in 1370.
Gave birth to Moerseil in 1370 at age 23.
1371: Gave birth to Curdiin in 1371 at age 24.
1373: Lost son Curdiin when Curdiin was 3 years old.
1376: Gave birth to Reynold in 1376 at age 29.
1378: Gave birth to Walburgis in 1378 at age 31.
1379: Gave birth to Imma in 1379 at age 32.
1380: Gave birth to Machtilden in 1380 at age 33.
1381: Gave birth to Goeskin in 1381 at age 34.
1384: Gave birth to Mourin in 1384 at age 37.
Lost son Mourin when Mourin was 1 years old.
